name: Onyx Thief
description:
Onyx Thief is a twin-stick shooter where you can't shoot any bullet. Instead you have to use your shield and your hook to ram into enemies.

Made for ENJMIN project in 6 weeks

______________________________________________________________________________________

Controls 

Keyboard / Mouse

WASD / ZQSD : Move

Left Click : Launch Hook (down) or Hook / Winch (up)

Right Click : Dash

Mouse : Aim

Escape : Pause

Xbox Controller

Left Trigger : Dash

Right Trigger : Launch Hook (down) or Hook / Winch (up)

Left Joystick : Move

Right Joystick : Aim 

Start : Pause
